text: Amni International Petroleum Development Company Limited is a Nigerian independent oil and gas exploration and production company founded in 1993 which engages in offshore oil and gas drilling, subsea flow line transportation and pipeline systems. The company operates two oil producing offshore blocks in Nigeria. In March 2014, it extended to Ghana with plans to drill on its deep-water Central Tano block. == References == == External links == * Category:Oil and gas companies of Nigeria Category:Companies based in Lagos Category:Energy companies established in 1993 Category:Non-renewable resource companies established in 1993 Category:Nigerian companies established in 1993
title: Amni
